archimate:BusinessObject.name: TerminationPoint
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"This is an abstract class that terminates transport entities, such as trails and connections. This object class is a basic object class from which subclasses, such as TrailTerminationPoint and ConnectionTerminationPoint, are derived.
This object is taken from M.3100. DEN-ng integrates it into the ManagedTransmissionEntity hierarchy so that it can interact with IETF managed objects. "
